name: Baaghi - The Escapist
description:
Setting :-

The game takes place in Mumbai which has been taken over by Kaliban with Osama as their leader. The enemies are well equipped with guns can Baaghi defeat them all?

Rules :-

Goal :-

A side view run-and-gun platformer game. Goal is to avoid getting killed and reach the end of the levels.

Challenge :-

Levels will get harder and harder.

Rules :-

1. You get points for finishing the level.

2. You get bonus points for killing enemies.

3. You have a health bar which depletes if enemies attack you.

4. You die instantly if you fall in a pit.

5. You die instantly if you touch an enemy.

6. Player health is 100hp.

7. Standard enemy bullet and player bullet cause -20hp, player fire rate is greater than enemy.

8. Enemy health is 100hp.

Assets(used from Unity Asset Store) ;-

1. Free platform game assets(Bayat Games)

2. Sunny land(ANSIMUZ)

3. Warped City 2(ANSIMUZ)

Hope, you will enjoy the game .
